# Split Apply Combine 

http://stat545.com/block024_group-nest-split-map.html


```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)

# entry level
gapminder %>%
    group_by(continent) %>%
    summarize_each(funs(min, max), lifeExp)

# nesting
gap_nested <- gapminder %>% 
   group_by(continent, country) %>% 
   nest()

# apply function map and mutate

```
